title: The Mackenzie Family: Mackenzie's Pleasure / Mackenzie's Magic
description: Navy SEAL Zane Mackenzie finds both danger and romance when he rescues an ambassador's lovely daughter from terrorist kidnappers in Mackenzie's Pleasure, while in Mackenzie's Magic, Maris Mackenzie joins forces with a dashing FBI agent to probe the disappearance of a prize horse. Reprint.
author: Linda Howard
